attributes.action: To ensure that care of the elderly is as free as it is in Scotland such that English citizens do not have to finance the care of their elderly relatives as Gordon Brown will not have to finance the care of his
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Elderly care is free in Scotland. This is financed by English taxation. In England the elderly are required to self finance OUT OF INCOME THAT IS ADDITIONALLY TAXED UNTIL THEY ARE ALMOST PENNILESS. THIS IS INEQUITABLE. I petition that the playing field is levelled. The costs that Gordon Brown has to meet for his parents should be the same as the costs my elderly mother and I have to meet.
